1.label: Change The State of Indicator Light
1.description: 1 means night light mode,0 means turn off the night light mode

2.label: Memory Function
2.description: 0 means no memory function,1 means memory function

5.label: Threshold of Watt For Load Caution
5.description: Threshold of watt for load caution

6.label: Threshold of Kwh For Load Caution
6.description: Threshold of kwh for load caution

metadata.inclusion:
1. Enter your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode
2. Press the socket on/off button three times within 1.5 seconds to be included
metadata.exclusion:
1. Enter your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode
2. Press the socket on/off button three times within 1.5 seconds to be excluded
metadata.reset:
1. To reset, press the socket on/off button three times within 1.5 seconds
2. then the fourth time, press and hold for seconds until the socket LED is off
3. the socket reset successfully

Use the "Reset" procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
